md:
giải nghĩa từ "lasts" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.
lasts (verb) - kéo dài, tồn tại, duy trì

* Lasts can be used to describe something that continues to exist or be in a particular state for a long time.
* Example: The company has lasted for over 50 years.
* Related words: last, lasting, long-lasting, endure, persist

lasts (verb) - đủ cho, kéo dài đến

* Lasts can be used to describe something that is sufficient for a particular period of time or until a certain point.
* Example: The food will last us until the end of the week.
* Related words: last, enough, sufficient, survive, sustain

lasts (noun) - khuôn, mẫu

* Lasts can be used to describe a model or shape used to make something, such as a shoe.
* Example: The cobbler used a last to make a new pair of shoes.
* Related words: last, model, shape, form, pattern
